comment: The closure of the projective sum of two sets of atoms is the same as the closure of their union. (Closure is actually double polarity, which can be trivially inferred from this theorem using ~ fveq2d .) (Contributed by NM, 6-Mar-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
